so_36393927: mkdir so

find . -mindepth 1 ! -name '*.old' -exec mv {} {}.old \;

so_8618853: index=0;
for name in *.txt
do
    cp "${name}" "${index}.txt"
    index=$((index+1))
done

ul_537163: find . -type f -path "./*.a/processed/*" -exec sh -c '
for path; do
  prefix=${path%%.a/processed*}
  cp "$path" "test/${prefix##*/}_${path##*processed/}"
done
' sh {} +
